long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smart Zoom is a browser extension that allows users to achieve a SmartZoom-like effect using only the mouse and keyboard, without a touchpad. It can magnify the area where the mouse hovers over the page while maintaining the page layout, enhancing the browsing experience. It uses CSS3 Transform technology to achieve this. 

Use this extension step by step
1. Hover to the area you want to zoom
2. Press key 'Ctrl+Shift+z' to zoom

Press 'esc' to restore

 More detail in website https://smartzoom.fun/
